title: WorkSphere
description: A comprehensive employee management system for Employees, HR, and Admins with secure authentication, payroll management, and role-based dashboards.
details: WorkSphere is a modern employee management system designed for Employees, HR personnel, and Admins. It offers secure authentication (email/password & Google Sign-In via Firebase), role-based dashboards, and responsive design. Employees can manage work logs and view payment history, HR can handle employee verification, worksheets, and salary requests, while Admins can manage users and approve payrolls. The system integrates charts (Recharts), animations (LottieFiles), and efficient server-state management using TanStack Query for a smooth experience.

title: Work Window
description: A freelance task marketplace connecting clients with freelancers for micro-jobs and task-based bidding.
details: Work Window is a responsive freelance task marketplace allowing users to post tasks, bid on jobs, and manage tasks in a personalized dashboard. It features secure authentication (email/password & Google), dynamic task listing, bid tracking, and a sleek UI enhanced with React Simple Typewriter and React Awesome Reveal.

title: Helpify-is a modern service-sharing web application
description: Enjoy a robust and straightforward authentication system supporting both email/password and Google sign-in/registration, ensuring your data is safe. As a service provider, you have full control to add, update, and delete your own services effortlessly.
details: Helpify is a modern service-sharing web application where users can find, offer, and book various types of services with ease. It's designed to provide a seamless and intuitive experience for service management, booking, and real-time status updates.
